message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at that price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
